attributes.action: Properly Regulated The Hairdressing & Barbering Industry
attributes.additional_details: Shop owners asking for proof of qualification & insurance before a stylist/barber being able to start.This also being in the owners public liability making it void if not met. Non UK workers: Insurer's have knowledge of other countries qualification systems & this being checked against the records in the country of origin or public liability not being granted. Any of the above mentioned found going against regulations should be heavily fined & be struck off from working in the industry.
attributes.background: The Barbering & Hairdressing industry to be properly regulated. It should be part of the insurance process. Insurance companies should ask for certificates on application, & these being checked against the records of City & Guilds or the Training & Enterprise Council before insurance is granted.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308539
